confirm.deleteResult: Are you sure you want to delete this result?

home.title: Gaudani Parivar | Jay Khodiyar Ma
home.instructions: Click the button below to upload your result
home.instructionsIntro: Please fill in accurate information and upload the result as follows:

step2.title: ‚úÖ 2) Select Medium
step2.description: Gujarati or English - It is necessary to select the appropriate medium.

step3.title: ‚úÖ 3) Select Standard
step3.description: Select the appropriate option from which standard the student is studying.

step4.title: ‚úÖ 4) Select Village / Family
step4.description: Select your village or family name from the list.

step5.title: ‚úÖ 5) Fill Marks Information
step5.description: Enter Total Marks and Marks Obtained. üìå Percentage will be calculated automatically by the system.

step7.title: üì∏ 7) Upload Result Photo
step7.description: ‚û° Minimum 1 clear photo is mandatory | ‚û° Maximum 2 photos can be uploaded | ‚ùó If the photo is blurry, incomplete, or unreadable, the result will be cancelled.

step8.title: üü¢ 8) Finally click on 'Submit' button
step8.description: Please verify all information before submitting.

instructionsNotes.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Special Note:
instructionsNotes.note1: üìç Only results from exams taken in March and April {year} will be accepted. Results from any other time will not be considered valid.
instructionsNotes.note2: üìç Only permanent Surat resident Gaudani family members can fill this form.
instructionsNotes.note3: üìç The form will not be submitted without filling all mandatory fields.

home.instructionsRequest: üôè Request: Please check and verify all information and photos before submitting.
home.deadlineDescription: Please submit your results before the deadline shown below.
home.deadlineExpired: Result submission has closed. Please contact the organizers for assistance.
home.readInstructionsCheckbox: I have read all instructions carefully

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.description: This result upload is only for Gaudani family members permanently residing in Surat. Members from other areas are not eligible to fill this form.

deadlineInfo.title: Result Upload Deadline
deadlineInfo.description: This page will be visible only until {date}. No results will be accepted after this date.

examYear.title: Which Exam Year Result to Upload?
examYear.description: Only upload results from March - April {year} final exam (varshik pariksh). Results from any other year will not be accepted.

photoUpload.title: How Many Photos Can Be Uploaded?
photoUpload.description: You can upload a maximum of 2 photos:
photoUpload.note: A clear, visible result photo is mandatory. Blurry or unclear results will not be accepted and will be cancelled.

standardInfo.title: Standard (Study Level)
standardInfo.description: All study levels after 12th standard (such as Diploma, Graduation, Masters, etc.) have been added to the standards ‚Äî so please select the appropriate option.

formRules.title: Form Filling Rules
formRules.description: All information requested in the form is mandatory. If any information is left blank, the form will not be submitted.

viewResultsInfo.title: Where Can I View the Submitted Result?

resultGraph.title: About Result Graph
resultGraph.description: Results will be displayed in the graph by standard. (If any standard appears missing, please contact the technical team.)

incompleteResults.title: Incomplete Results / Errors
incompleteResults.description: If the result is incomplete, unclear, or not according to the rules, that result will be cancelled and will not be accepted.

upload.title: Add New Result
upload.subtitle: Please fill in your result information
upload.closedDescription: The deadline to upload results has passed. Please contact the organizers for assistance.

success.title: Thank You!
success.message: Your result submitted successfully, you can see your results by your mobile no.

viewResults.searchSubtitle: Enter your 10-digit mobile number to view all your submitted results
viewResults.noResultsMessage: No results found for mobile number:
viewResults.checkMobileNumber: Please check your mobile number and try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.lastDateToUploadResultHelp: Set the deadline for result uploads. Leave empty to allow uploads anytime.

validation.marksExceedTotal: Obtained marks cannot exceed total marks
validation.uploadDeadlinePassed: The last date to upload results has passed. Please contact the administrator.
